item.title: Thinking Negatively
Quotes
item.description: Here’s a compilation of some of my favorite quotes. “Our painful experiences aren’t a liability—they’re a gift. They give us perspective and meaning, an opportunity to find our unique purpose and our strength.” ― Edith Eger,The Choice: Embrace the Possible “We don’t know where we’re going, we don’t know what’s going to happen, but no one can take away from you what you put in your own mind.” ― Edith Eger,The Choice: Embrace the Possible

item.title: Reading List
item.description: Here’s a compilation of some of my favorite books.
